channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Opinium, 9–12 April 2019 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Conservative Party (ECR): 11–16 seats
  • Labour Party (S&D): 26–30 seats
  • Liberal Democrats (ALDE): 4–6 seats
  • Scottish National Party (Greens/EFA): 4–5 seats
  • Plaid Cymru (Greens/EFA): 1–2 seats
  • UK Independence Party (EAPN): 7–12 seats
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 0–2 seats
  • Brexit Party (EFDD): 7–11 seats
  • Change UK (EPP): 0 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Opinium, 9–12 April 2019 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Opinium, 9–12 April 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Conservative Party (ECR): 15.4–18.7%
  • Labour Party (S&D): 27.1–31.0%
  • Liberal Democrats (ALDE): 8.8–11.4%
  • Scottish National Party (Greens/EFA): 5.0–7.1%
  • Plaid Cymru (Greens/EFA): 0.6–1.5%
  • UK Independence Party (EAPN): 11.6–14.6%
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 5.0–7.1%
  • Brexit Party (EFDD): 10.7–13.5%
  • Change UK (EPP): 3.2–4.9%

item.title: Opinion Poll by YouGov, 10–11 April 2019 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Conservative Party (ECR): 9–14 seats
  • Labour Party (S&D): 19–27 seats
  • Liberal Democrats (ALDE): 2–5 seats
  • Scottish National Party (Greens/EFA): 4–5 seats
  • Plaid Cymru (Greens/EFA): 1–2 seats
  • UK Independence Party (EAPN): 8–14 seats
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 1–6 seats
  • Brexit Party (EFDD): 8–15 seats
  • Change UK (EPP): 0–4 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by YouGov, 10–11 April 2019 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by YouGov, 10–11 April 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Conservative Party (ECR): 14.6–17.9%
  • Labour Party (S&D): 22.3–26.3%
  • Liberal Democrats (ALDE): 6.9–9.4%
  • Scottish National Party (Greens/EFA): 4.1–6.2%
  • Plaid Cymru (Greens/EFA): 0.7–1.6%
  • UK Independence Party (EAPN): 12.6–15.8%
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 6.9–9.4%
  • Brexit Party (EFDD): 13.6–16.9%
  • Change UK (EPP): 6.0–8.3%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Hanbury Strategy, 5–8 April 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Conservative Party (ECR): 21.4–25.1%
  • Labour Party (S&D): 36.2–40.5%
  • Liberal Democrats (ALDE): 6.9–9.3%
  • Scottish National Party (Greens/EFA): 3.3–5.0%
  • Plaid Cymru (Greens/EFA): 0.1–0.6%
  • UK Independence Party (EAPN): 6.0–8.3%
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 3.3–5.0%
  • Brexit Party (EFDD): 8.9–11.5%
  • Change UK (EPP): 3.3–5.0%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Opinium for The Observer, 28–30 March 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Conservative Party (ECR): 22.2–25.9%
  • Labour Party (S&D): 28.0–32.0%
  • Liberal Democrats (ALDE): 8.8–11.4%
  • Scottish National Party (Greens/EFA): 3.2–4.9%
  • Plaid Cymru (Greens/EFA): 0.6–1.5%
  • UK Independence Party (EAPN): 16.4–19.7%
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 6.9–9.3%
